attributes.action: Changes to the UK Driving Licences
attributes.additional_details:
Age and inexperience are two of the the biggest factors in causing accident, injury and death on the roads of the UK so my request are

- New driver to drive to a curfew (Not between 11pm and 5am) and in restricted powered vehicles (not above 1400cc engines) for 1 year after passing test.
- Drivers who pass the age of 70 should take a mandatory assessed drive which can agree a five year licence extension, order a series of refresher driving sessions before a re-test and should the assessor still feel that the driver is not safe to drive withdraw the licence.
